Title: Chapter Five: Through My Most Grievous Fault
Writer: Jeremy Slater (created by), William Peter Blatty (inspired by the novel by), David Grimm
Actors: Alfonso Herrera, Ben Daniels, Hannah Kasulka, Brianne Howey
Plot: As the exorcism begins, Tomas and Marcus engage the demon in spiritual warfare, with the pressure of the process driving a wedge between the Rance family.
